Site Badge

Let customers know that Wine Spectator has recommended your business. As long as your establishment is listed in the most recent available version of Wine Spectator’s Guide to Napa Valley app, you can display this badge on your website.

Instructions: Copy and paste the code shown to the right of the badge to your web site.
